snippet.title: Escape from Moonbase Alpha for the BBC Micro
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Acorn Electron


Game description:

You were left behind by your crew. Now you have to get to the Doctor (yeah, take a wild guess who he shall resemble...) and pay him 10 gold bags.

Escape from Moonbase Alpha is a 3D adventure game, in which you pick up gold and avoid all kinds of enemies.
Wizards can return you to your normal human form if you were turned into a frog before or give you a Hulk pill, which will turn you into the Incredible Hulk....no, really.
